name: Hotel Tivoli Sintra

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed in the Tivoli Sintra mid November 2006 ( low season) so we had the chance to have a very affordable room for the class of this hotel ( 75 eur / room if I remember well ) I think they even gave us a larger room becaus it was very spacious, we had a nice view with a balcony, the room was very fine and clean.
reviews.title: Ding dong

likes.disliked: — You can ear the churches bells during the hole night

reviews.text: The hotel is perfectly located in the middle of the town, close to all sights of interest
reviews.title: Musty, Rude and Unhelpful

reviews.text: The staff proved to be very gentle and helpfull, the restaurant staff was very kind as well and the food we had there was very fine compared to what we have been served in other locations in "tourist" restaurants across Portugal.
reviews.title: Great location, fantastic views
Delightful stay at Tivoli Sintra
reviews.text: The weak point comes from that 2 churches that you can hear from inside the room, windows and curtains closed at night.

description: In the centre of Sintra, this is a 4 star hotel with private parking which gives you the opportunity to enjoy the surrounding scenery, history and leisure facilities. Breakfast in the restaurant allows you to enjoy the quality food at this welcoming and friendly hotel. The view from the panoramic bar reveals its stunning location between the Serra de Sintra and the Palácio da Vila, where the sea can just be seen on the horizon.
